response.overview: On this episode of Hitting the Highspots Naylor is joined by his longtime friend, former developmental cohort, and huge New Japan star Juice Robinson. This is not your typical interview as Juice and Naylor discuss everything about WWE Developmental from being in the system to the bar scene in Tampa. juice talks about how his four years in the system went from good to really bad.  Not many people leave that system and go onto to do big things especially if they were as unknown as Juice. Find out the British camps brought the love of professional wrestling back to Juices career and how he made his way into the hottest company on the planet New Japan Pro Wrestling. In this interview Juice gives his thoughts on what he loves about being a Japanese gaijin and all talks about all the top stars in New Japan.  So get ready to start Hitting the Highspots with this conversation between two friends.
response.title: Hitting The Highspots - Juice Robinson
